panels.description: ceph version based on the version running in the monitors
panels.title: Ceph Version

panels.description: ODF (noobaa and ceph) storage classes
panels.title: Storageclasses

panels.description: Includes mgr,mons,osds and rbd-mirror daemons
panels.title: Total Ceph CPU Core Usage

matcher.options: {container="mgr", endpoint="http-metrics", instance="10.131.0.10:9283", job="rook-ceph-mgr", managedBy="ocs-storagecluster", namespace="openshift-storage", pod="rook-ceph-mgr-a-84fb4f8597-5b2mg", prometheus="openshift-monitoring/k8s", service="rook-ceph-mgr"}

panels.description: Total of IOPS for rbd devices within the cluster
panels.title: Client IOPS (rbd* devices)

panels.description: Data reduction ratio
panels.title: Data Reduction

panels.description: Sum of cpu usage for ALL noobaa daemons expessed as a percentage of cpu cores (i.e. > 100% = 1 core, 200% = 2 cores)
panels.title: Total Noobaa CPU Core Usage

panels.description: Count of the number of noobaa endpoints in the cluster. The red line depicts the scaling limit.
panels.title: Noobaa Endpoints Active

panels.description: Count of 'active' radosgw daemons
panels.title: RGW Daemons

panels.description: Requests queue length
panels.title: Q Length

panels.description: Active Requests Queue
panels.title: Q Active

panels.description: This is the primary PG count
panels.title: PG Count by Pool

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total[1m]) * on(instance, device) group_left(ceph_daemon) label_replace(label_replace(ceph_disk_occupation, "instance", "$1", "instance", "(.*)"), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)")) + sum by(instance) (rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total[1m]) * on(instance, device) group_left(ceph_daemon) label_replace(label_replace(ceph_disk_occupation, "instance", "$1", "instance", "(.*)"), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)"))

sum by(instance) (rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total[1m]) * on(instance, device) group_left(ceph_daemon) label_replace(label_replace(ceph_disk_occupation, "instance", "$1", "instance", "(.*)"), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)")) + sum by(instance) (rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[1m]) * on(instance, device) group_left(ceph_daemon) label_replace(label_replace(ceph_disk_occupation, "instance", "$1", "instance", "(.*)"), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)"))

panels.description: Network receive + transmit bytes for all active (UP) physical interfaces on each host in the cluster

targets.expr:
(sum by(instance) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{device=~"(eth|en).*"}[1m]) * on(instance, device) node_network_info{operstate="up"})) +
(sum by(instance) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device=~"(eth|en).*"}[1m]) * on(instance, device) node_network_info{operstate="up"}))

panels.title: Total Bandwidth by Host

panels.description: Network receive + transmit bytes for all active (UP) physical interfaces on each host in the cluster
panels.title: Network Load : $worker

panels.description: Links speed and MTU size on physical interfaces in an UP state
panels.title: NIC Configuration : $worker
